ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Today's patch message.
ygData.msgSnippet: Because the purpose of the Sol ro Temple and it s quests was because of a series of complaints that with the removal of rubicite there was nothing of
ygData.messageBody:
Because the purpose of the Sol ro Temple and it's quests was because of a series of complaints that with the removal of rubicite there was nothing of particular value at midlevel let alone anything for the specific classes between the 1-20 and the 45-50 planir stuff and had been admited so by Verant.
Granted no specific information was given about the weapon but all roads lead to Rome.

Adon
On Tue, 19 Sep 2000 10:03:49 -0700 eqbards@egroups.com wrote:

> At 03:08 PM 9/19/00 +0000, you wrote:
> >
> >Well as usuall absolutely nothing for bards other then perhaps trade
> skills (cough cough) and maybe the weapon? Place your bets anyone REALLY
> think we got a bard weapon? I bet the Lambent weapon isn't even in the game
> yet and that's supposed to be mid level. > >Adon
>
> umm, it's been posted a few times that it was just flavor for a possible
> future quest. how does anyone know that it's ''supposed to be mid level''
> when no information about it exists because the quest does not exist. it's
> been that way since the temple of solusek ro was opened.
>
> Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
> with the subject submissions.
